TemporalDirections.TEXT: 299,JERRY,Comedian.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 300,VANESSA,Really? That explains it.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 301,JERRY,"(thinking; quickly) Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft. Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 302,ROGER,Are you ready?,1.0,S01E01,1.0 303,VANESSA,We gotta run. Happy birthday!,1.0,S01E01,1.0 304,JERRY,"(thinking) I cant believe it. I got nothing! I dont even know her name! Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppenheim and Taft. Sagman, Bennet, Robbins, Oppen... Sagman... Sag...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 305,JERRY,"That wasnt so bad, really.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 306,ELAINE,"Yknow, um, you could use a little work on your manners.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 307,JERRY,Why? What did I do?,1.0,S01E01,1.0 308,ELAINE,"Wel-Well, I just dont appreciate these little courtesy responses, like Im selling you aluminum siding.",1.0,S01E01,1.0
